SELECT
FROM AC_OPERATOR_IDENTITYRES a LEFT JOIN AC_ROLE b ON a.GUID_AC_RESOURCE = b.GUID WHERE a.GUID_IDENTITY = #{identityGuid}

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT a.* FROM `ac_role_bhv` a WHERE a.guid_role IN ${roleGuid} AND a.guid_func_bhv NOT IN ( SELECT d.GUID_FUNC_BHV FROM `ac_operator_bhv` d WHERE d.GUID_OPERATOR = #{operatorGuid} AND d.AUTH_TYPE = '0' ) ) aa, `ac_func_bhv` b, `ac_bhv_def` c WHERE b.GUID_FUNC = #{funcGuid} AND b.ISEFFECTIVE = 'Y' AND aa.guid_func_bhv = b.GUID AND b.GUID_BHV = c.GUID

SELECT
FROM `ac_operator_bhv` a, `ac_func_bhv` b, `ac_bhv_def` c WHERE a.GUID_OPERATOR = #{operatorGuid} AND b.GUID_FUNC = #{funcGuid} AND a.AUTH_TYPE = '0' AND b.ISEFFECTIVE = 'Y' AND a.GUID_FUNC_BHV = b.GUID AND b.GUID_BHV = c.GUID

SELECT
FROM `ac_operator_bhv` a, `ac_func_bhv` b, `ac_bhv_def` c WHERE a.GUID_OPERATOR = #{operatorGuid} AND b.GUID_FUNC = #{funcGuid} AND a.AUTH_TYPE = '1' AND b.ISEFFECTIVE = 'Y' AND a.GUID_FUNC_BHV = b.GUID AND b.GUID_BHV = c.GUID
mapper.sql: a.guid_identity as guidIdentity ,a.ac_resourcetype as acResourcetype ,a.guid_ac_resource as guidAcResource ,b.role_name as roleName

a.guid_operator as guidOperator ,a.guid_func as guidFunc ,a.auth_type as authType ,a.start_date as startDate ,a.end_date as endDate ,a.guid_app as guidApp ,a.guid_funcgroup as guidFuncgroup ,b.FUNC_NAME ,c.APP_NAME
c.guid as guid ,c.guid_behtype as guidBehtype ,c.bhv_code as bhvCode ,c.bhv_name as bhvName ,b.guid as guidFuncBhv
